entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
